    • Uses of UtilDatagramException in network

      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Receive a Packet (in a DatagramPacket) via a DatagramSocket.

    • Uses of UtilDatagramException in util

      Methods in util that throw UtilDatagramException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.net.DatagramPacket Datagram.buildDatagram​(Packet packet, int destinationPort)
      Create a DatagramPacket from a Packet.
      static byte[] Datagram.buildHeader​(Packet packet)
      Build header for datagram, based on Packet.
      static Packet Datagram.createPacketFromDatagram​(java.net.DatagramPacket datagram, java.net.DatagramSocket receivingSocket)
      Create a Packet object from a received DatagramPacket Note: only works for received datagrams!
      static int Datagram.getHeaderByteOffset​(byte[] datagram)
      Get byteOffset from header.
      static int Datagram.getHeaderHeaderLength​(byte[] datagram)
      Get headerLength from header.
      static int Datagram.getHeaderId​(byte[] datagram)
      Get id from header.
      static byte[] Datagram.getPayload​(byte[] datagram, int payloadLength)
      Get payload from the datagramPacket.
